creator: Silksoftgroup LLC
descriptionHtml:
Pay, share cards, and send money - all in S1lkPay. Enjoy easy signups, instant card openings, secure contactless payments, and fast peer-to-peer transactions.
 
What is S1lkPay?

S1lkPay is a prepaid card platform for local and cross-border transfers.
With S1lkPay, users can send and receive payments without having to worry about bank accounts or credit scores. S1lkPay also offers access to financial products and services for the unbanked and underbanked population.

Send and request money instantly. You can easily share and request money from the palm of your hand. Pay, send and request money with peace of mind. No bank account or credit history checks.

FAST: Lightning fast money transfers. Enjoy instant top-ups, immediate transactions and hassle-free account verification. You can open your account online in a few minutes and start using it straight away without waitlists or lines. Just sign up on your S1lkpay app and start sending and requesting money.

GLOBAL: Share and request cards with affordable rates and fast international transactions. Get the contactless prepaid card and spend online and in-store at home and abroad. Transfer funds globally to anyone and anywhere in the world. Send and request money with friends and family easily, no matter where they are in the world

MULTICURRENCY: Open KZT and USD account straight from your phone. Opening an account in S1lkpay is easy: All you need is a phone number and an ID like your passport.

BORDERLESS: Transfer money borderless. Share cards and get fee-free exchange rates. Spend abroad like a local with no mark-up for exchange rates.

MANAGE: Stay in control of your cards and the ones you shared. Track expenses on your personal accounts, plus those accounts that belong to the friends and family you've shared the money with. Once you've shared money, you can always restrict access.

INSTANT: Get instant notifications. Get notifications about purchases and transfers. Stay up to date with all the activities in the application
descriptionShort: Pay, share cards, and send money - all in S1lkPay

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Исправление ошибок и улучшения производительности

title: S1lkPay

creator: Silksoftgroup LLC
descriptionHtml:
S1lkpay - your digital payment card for sharing, paying and requesting money
Pay for purchases, transfer money to the account, make both local and international transfers. Simple sing up and instant opening of cards and all this is done right on your phone 📲

Simply registration
The application is ideal for people who care about their family and loved ones and want to help financially, regardless of the location of the person. Registration takes just a couple of clicks, as you just need to enter your mobile number and details of your identity card or passport. Then you can start using the virtual card.

Main features of S1lkpay app
💸 Easily send and request money from family or friends;
To share money, you just share your cards, wherever your family or friends are.
💳 payment for purchases online and in stores both in your country and abroad;
The benefits of using the card abroad is receiving the exchange rate at favorable rates without commission.
💵 opening an account in tenge or dollars. New currencies are coming up;
All this can be done right on the phone, the availability of various tariff plans will allow you to choose the one you need;
📊 control of personal expenses on the card;
In addition to controlling personal expenses on the account, it's also possible to track expenses that you have shared with family and friends.
🔐 access restriction;
The time and period of using the funds on the card that you shared depends only on you, so you can also regulate these processes in the S1lkpay app
💰 instant deposits and money transfers;
There are no bank account or credit score check, and there is no need to spend time on waiting lists and queues, which makes it possible to open a card as quickly as possible right on your phone.

S1lkpay is your assistant with payments and card sharing with your friends and family. You are always aware of all transactional operations because you can track and view everything right on your mobile. Easy, fast, but most importantly - reliable! 😉
descriptionShort: Service: pay purchase, payments, send money abroad, open, receive and share card

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Kz language support.
- Bug fixes.

All this can be done right on the phone, the availability of various tariff plans will allow you to choose the one you need;
📊 control of personal expenses on the card;
In addition to controlling personal expenses on the account, it's also possible to track expenses that you have shared with family and friends.
🔐 access restriction;
The time and period of using the funds on the card that you shared depends only on you, so you can also regulate these processes in the S1lkpay app
💰 instant deposits and money transfers;
There are no bank account or credit score check, and there is no need to spend time on waiting lists and queues, which makes it possible to open a card as quickly as possible right on your phone.

S1lkpay is your assistant with payments and card sharing with your friends and family. You are always aware of all transactional operations because you can track and view everything right on your mobile. Easy, fast, but most importantly - reliable! 😉
descriptionShort: Service: pay purchase, payments, send money abroad, open, receive and share card

title:

creator: Silksoftgroup LLC
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to S1lkpay, your ultimate financial companion. S1lkpay is a secure and convenient digital wallet and payment app that simplifies your financial transactions. Whether you're paying bills, shopping online, or supporting loved ones, S1lkpay has got you covered.

Effortless Money Management:

Instant Digital Payment Card: Open a virtual prepaid card for seamless online and in-store purchases.
Secure Mobile Money Transfer: Send and receive funds securely with our encrypted platform, perfect for both local and international transactions.
Family Finance Management: Share cards with family and friends, and easily control shared expenses from your mobile device.
Key Features:

Mobile Payments: Enjoy the ease of cashless payments for all your daily needs.
Expense Tracker: Keep an eye on your spending with our user-friendly expense tracking feature.
Multi-Currency Account: Travel with ease using our multi-currency account, offering competitive exchange rates.
Financial Services: Access a range of services including budgeting tools and financial support for your loved ones.
Card Control: Ensure the security of your transactions with advanced card control features.
Why Choose S1lkpay?

Fast and Reliable: Experience quick and dependable payment processing with our secure platform.
User-Friendly: Navigate effortlessly through our intuitive interface, designed for hassle-free financial management.
No Bank Account Required: Get started without the need for a traditional bank account or credit checks.
Download S1lkpay today and take the first step towards simplified and secure financial management. Whether you're paying, transferring, or sharing money, S1lkpay is your trusted companion for all things finance.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Release Notes for Version 3.0.7

New Features:
Improved input for Bulgarian phone numbers.

Bug Fixes:
Corrected error text during card closure.
Added missing error for transfer limit exceeded.
Proper display of backend errors.
Fixed biometric card detail issues.
Resolved mirrored card number issue.
Thank you for your feedback and support.

Best regards,
The S1lkPay Team
